verses.verse: But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> the <S%G5550>times<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2540>seasons<s%>, <S%G80>brethren<s%>, ye <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G5532>need<s%> that aught be written <S%G1125>unto<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G846>yourselves<s%> <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G199>perfectly<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> the <S%G2250>day<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G2064>cometh<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> a <S%G2812>thief<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3571>night<s%>.

<S%G1063><s%> <S%G3752>When<s%> they are <S%G3004>saying<s%>, <S%G1515>Peace<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G803>safety<s%>, <S%G5119>then<s%> <S%G160>sudden<s%> <S%G3639>destruction<s%> <S%G2186>cometh<s%> upon <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G5618>as<s%> <S%G5604>travail<s%> <S%G3588>upon<s%> a <S%G2192>woman<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G1064>child<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G1628>shall<s%> in <S%G3361>no<s%> wise <S%G3756>escape<s%>.

for <S%G5210>ye<s%> <S%G2075>are<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5207>sons<s%> of <S%G5457>light<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5207>sons<s%> of the <S%G2250>day<s%>: we <S%G2070>are<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> of the <S%G3571>night<s%>, <S%G3761>nor<s%> of <S%G4655>darkness<s%>;

so <S%G3767>then<s%> let <S%G2518>us<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G2518>sleep<s%>, <S%G5613>as<s%> do the <S%G3062>rest<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> let us <S%G1127>watch<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> be <S%G2532>sober<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G2518>they<s%> that <S%G2518>sleep<s%> <S%G2518>sleep<s%> in the <S%G3571>night<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3184>they<s%> that are <S%G3182>drunken<s%> are <S%G3184>drunken<s%> in the <S%G3571>night<s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3525>let<s%> <S%G2249>us<s%>, since we <S%G5607>are<s%> of the <S%G2250>day<s%>, be <S%G3525>sober<s%>, putting <S%G1746>on<s%> the <S%G2382>breastplate<s%> of <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G26>love<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> for a <S%G4030>helmet<s%>, the <S%G1680>hope<s%> of <S%G4991>salvation<s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> we <S%G2065>beseech<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>, <S%G80>brethren<s%>, to <S%G1492>know<s%> them that <S%G2872>labor<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> are <S%G4291>over<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3560>admonish<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>;

See <S%G3708><s%> that <S%G3361>none<s%> <S%G591>render<s%> unto any <S%G5100>one<s%> <S%G2556>evil<s%> <S%G473>for<s%> <S%G2556>evil<s%>; <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G3842>always<s%> <S%G1377>follow<s%> after that which is <S%G18>good<s%>, <S%G2532>one<s%> <S%G1519>toward<s%> <S%G240>another<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> toward1519, 3956 <S%G5100>all<s%>.
prove <S%G1381><s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%>; hold <S%G2722>fast<s%> that which is <S%G2570>good<s%>;

And <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G2316>God<s%> of <S%G1515>peace<s%> <S%G846>himself<s%> <S%G37>sanctify<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G3651>wholly<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> may <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4151>spirit<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5590>soul<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4983>body<s%> be <S%G5083>preserved<s%> <S%G3648>entire<s%>, without <S%G274>blame<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> the <S%G3952>coming<s%> of <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>.
Faithful <S%G4103><s%> is he that <S%G2564>calleth<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>, <S%G3739>who<s%> will <S%G2532>also<s%> do <S%G4160>it<s%>.
